entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
